description: Refers to the high-speed train that college students take to return to the city where their school is located, from their hometown in the countryside after a long vacation, feeling reluctant to go back to school. "emo" stands for emotional, used here to mean "depressed" or "gloomy."

examples.chinese: 明天开学,要坐上emo动车了
examples.translation: School starts tomorrow, I have to get on the emo bullet train.
Sitting on the emo bullet train, my heart is as dead as ashes.

examples.chinese: 下午要坐上emo动车了,有点坐立不安
examples.translation: I have to take the emo bullet train this afternoon, feeling a bit restless.
